{{Description|The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.}}
'''Adventurer's Golden Goblet''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Adventurer]].

==Description==
An old golden goblet that the adventurer used to drink water. It is said that he found it in an old ruin.<br>The exterior is engraved with ancient symbols and inlaid with a faded gemstone.<br>Eventually, the adventurer bid farewell to the nomadic lifestyle.<br>This old golden goblet was traded in for new, shiny Mora.
